website_summaries.verdict: A great choice for men who prefer a dressy look to typical athletic-style golf shoes; though others on our shortlist are more practical when it comes to performance and price.
pros: Not your typical golf shoes, Lux stands out for the dressy looks combined with a comfortable fit and reliable traction
cons: The style and the high price won't fit every golfer's needs or budget
Not quite as flexible as others on our list

customer_reviews.title: The best looking and most comfortable golf shoe on the market.
customer_reviews.text: ECCO makes one of the few classic-looking golf shoes still on the market. The shoes are extremely comfortable and if properly cared for will last for years. Although these are consistently sized, go by the list European sizes because the US sizes do not correspond to other manufacturers. For example, I normally wear a US size 8-1/2, but the European size 41 that fits me perfectly is supposedly a US size 7-1/2.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Ecco Lux Golf Shoe for golf traditionalists
customer_reviews.text: These golf shoes are as good as the Ecco World Class GTX. The soles are stable and do not torque like the tennis type golf shoes that are currently in vogue. I have been wearing Ecco World Class for six years and no one makes a better golf shoe (IMO). The Ecco Lux is about a half size bigger than their World Class shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Best Shoe of all time
customer_reviews.text: No better shoe in golf (Ecco) .I’ll take the Pepsi challenge. I used to play with a professional golfer. He never tried them, and asked me about them. I would sell these Ecco shoes for free. He got a pair and said he would never go back. You ....just ....don’t ....know until you play in them . It’s not even close. I’ve played in footjoy, Nike, adidas, UA. They just don’t compare. Or...you could give money to advertising. I don’t care.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Bradsher

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes; great service
customer_reviews.text: Excellent golf shoes. Only problem was three spikes would not stay in place but I returned them to the vendor and got new ones. No problems with the return and the shoes have been great.
customer_reviews.author: DrGill

customer_reviews.title: Nice shoes, fit larger than expected.
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful shoe, just have to get the size correct. i normally wear a size 8 1/2 - 9 US depending on the shoe. Size chart said size 9 would be a EU size 43. But I tried that and they were way to big. After reading some reviews I went with EU size 41. Fit is perfect. I like them so much I purchase a pair of white ones too. They are wider than most golf shoes I have purchased so the heel slides a bit if I don't wear thicker socks.
customer_reviews.author: Charles Ham

customer_reviews.title: The leather looks cheap
customer_reviews.text: Ecco is know for great quality but after my shoes arrived it was clear that the quality of leather in these shows are just not there. The leather has a very fake shinny film to it that makes it look like plastic. I'm sure its a good shoe but just not my style. Sending it back was a breeze and my refund was quick. Amazon is the best.......
customer_reviews.author: Duane M. Kemp

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: ECCO shoe are all outstanding. Only shoe brand that I buy
customer_reviews.author: John McLimans

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful shoes. They travelled overseas with me and are destined to go again and again.

customer_reviews.title: Color not accurate online
customer_reviews.text: The brown I received does not have the slightly reddish hue that is indicated by the online picture, which was disappointing. Extremely comfortable, stable, and well performing shoe, though.
customer_reviews.author: Spine Doc

customer_reviews.text: Best investment, I made in a pair of golf shoes

product_meta.title: ECCO Men's Luxe Golf Shoe
product_meta.description:
The flagship of the ECCO golf shoe line, the luxe is a traditional spike shoe with premium leathers and a combination leather and polyurethane outsole for a traditional look and stable platform.Champ SLIM LOK & ZARMA spikes for total stability throughout your swing

ECCO is a European shoe company founded in Denmark in 1963. Today they own and operate factories throughout Europe and Asia. They produce all the leather used in making Ecco shoes, taking measures to protect the environment at the same time. Their sole aim is to make a comfortable walking shoe.
feature_bullets: Premium leather welt construction combined with the durability and comfort of direct injected PU midsole
TPU outsole offers players greater comfort while maintaining consistent stability while shot making
Hydromax Classic water resistant leather showcases a premium, rich look without compromising softness and breathability
Perforated leather lining for enhanced climate control
Removable leather inlay sole offer Extra-Width option
